title: Can you send me parts - top speaker (it does not work well) for my phone Pixel 4
content:
Hi, 

I have Pixel 4 but I have problem with my top speaker. It does not work well. I asked in couple mobile services if they can fix it but they donÂ´t have a parts for this phone but they said if I would bring it they can fix it. Is there any way you would send me the speaker for the phone?
I been living in Tauranga in New Zealand right now. 


Best regards

Robert
